name: Scarlet Flame Marshal Dragon, Gandeeva
effect: [AUTO](VC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your turn, choose a card from your drop, and you may bind it face down.[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +2000 for each face down card in your bind zone. If your bind zone has five or more face down cards, this unit gets [Critical] +1.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and choose five of your opponent's rear-guards with different grades from each other. Reveal the top five cards of your deck, retire all of the chosen units with the same grades as the cards revealed, shuffle your deck, and if you retired one or less cards, draw a card, choose a card from your drop, and bind it face down.
flavor: What the dragon of Scarlet Flame yearns for, is the harshest battlefield.

name: Great Flame Axe of Ambitious Scales, Colgaflan
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your ride phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put this card on the bottom of deck], and draw a card. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit.
flavor: On whose authority are all of you standing before me!!

name: Mirror Reflection Equip, Mirrors Vairina
effect: XoverDress - One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit (You may place it by stacking it on all of the specified units instead of normal calling it to (RC))[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by XoverDress, choose up to two cards with "Vairina" in their card names from your drop, and put them as this unit's originalDress.[AUTO](RC):When this unit in the XoverDress state attacks, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. Then, [COST][put an originalDress of this unit with "Vairina" in its card name into drop], and perform "draw a card" or "[Counter-Charge 1]".
flavor: Shine upon the darkness with endless light and let your true wish be reflected.

name: Karmic Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 with "Drajeweled" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Drajeweled" in its different card name from this unit from your hand, soul, or drop], choose two cards from your drop, put them into your soul, and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 4] cards with different grades], choose two of your opponent's rear-guards, retire them, choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and until end of turn, increase or decrease its [Power] to 1.
flavor: For now, I will become the demon that puts the world to the test.

name: Xeno Almajestar, Astroea=Bico Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 with "Astroea" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Astroea" in its different card name from this unit from your hand, soul, or drop], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 3], bind all [Critical] trigger [Soul-Blast] for this cost, choose one of your rear-guards, [Stand] it, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn for every two [Critical] triggers in your bind zone.
flavor: Linkage Bicolite――it is time; the fulfilment of our long-cherished wish.

name: Black Sky Thunder Quaking Queen, Leimina
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your ride phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put this card on the bottom of deck], and draw a card. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your soul, and call it to (RC). If you called a card, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Heed my call, lightning of the quaking heavens――!

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Penetrate Aquas
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), your opponent chooses a card from their drop, and imprisons it in your Prison.[CONT](RC)/(GC):If two or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +10000, and for the battle this unit attacked, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Shall we go and make a hole in the heads of naughty children?

name: Sickle Blade of Inquest, Habitable Zone
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your ride phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put this card on the bottom of deck], and draw a card. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one set order, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Until end of turn, you may play up to a total of two orders, and play the next set order without paying its cost.
flavor: Can you see it? That's the new world we seek.

name: Blue Deathster, Hanada Halfway
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Blue Deathster" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card. [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your Strategy card was put into the order zone this turn, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +2000, and if this unit is in the back row center column, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: This operation will make it clear who the ace is.

name: Great Sage of Heavenly Law, Solrairon
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your battle phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], you declare either normal unit or trigger unit, and reveal the top card of your deck. If you revealed the card type you declared, this unit gets "[CONT](VC):All of your units get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, call it to (RC) or discard it, and put the rest on the top or bottom of the deck.
flavor: Let us use our wisdom to guide those bewildered by the unknown!

name: Hexaorb Sorceress, "Aquamarine"
effect: [CONT](VC):This unit is also regarded as "Hexaorb Sorceress".[CONT](VC):If you persona rode this turn, this unit gets drive +1, and the [Power] increase of your trigger effects gets +10000.[AUTO](VC):When a trigger unit is revealed for the drive check of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it.
flavor: Indigo revelation――now is the time to be here.

name: Spiral Cutie Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your ride phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put this unit on the bottom of deck], and draw a card. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest on the top or bottom of the deck.
flavor: I'll erase it and drill it, make it all nice and clean♪

name: Teasing Spiritualist, Zorga Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 with "Zorga" in its card name.[CONT](VC):When you would play a normal order, you can bind a normal order from your drop, and Alchemagic.[CONT](VC):If you did Alchemagic this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Zorga" in its different card name from this unit from your hand, soul, or drop], choose a card from your drop, and call it to (RC) if it is a unit card, or put it into your hand if it is a normal order.
flavor: This is a rather well-made toy... Let's have a little fun.

name: Servitude of Funeral Procession, Lianorn Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 with "Lianorn" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Lianorn" in its different card name from this unit from your hand, soul, or drop], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, call it to (RC), choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, choose up to three of your back row [Stand] units with "Boost", and boost this unit. If you boosted with three or more units, at the end of that battle, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose two of your rear-guards, and [Stand] them.
flavor: Even if all sound disappears from the world, our music exists for the world tree..

name: Love-binding Maiden, Margaret
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your ride phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put this unit on the bottom of deck], and draw a card. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and your opponent cannot intercept until end of turn. All of your opponent's front row rear-guards cannot [Stand] during the next stand phase.
flavor: Hm-hm~! Did you really think you could defy me?

name: Inscribing Bullet of Dust Storm, Baxter
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit is attacked by your opponent's unit not in the same column as this unit, this unit cannot be hit. [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard in the same column as this unit is retired during your turn, choose one of your vanguards, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: It's too bad, but you cannot defeat me as you are.

name: Dragritter, Alfaqaar
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard with "Gandeeva" in its card name attacks a grade 3 or greater vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & bind this unit face down], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or less unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Don't expect forgiveness or mercy from my sword.

name: Crimson Scale Sword Maestro, Burnaia
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if any player's rear-guard was retired this turn, [COST][bind this unit face down], and draw a card.
flavor: A flame that blazed up once won't die out so easily!

name: Illuminate Equip Dragon, Graillumirror
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to two cards with "Vairina" in their card names from among them, reveal them, choose up to one of the revealed cards, put it into your hand, discard the rest of the revealed cards, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Prayers will deliver. So long as light shines in our hearts.

name: Diabolos Heavy Launcher, Patrick
effect: [CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Burst", this unit gets [Power] +10000. (Active on opponent's turn too)[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and move it to (GC). If you are in "Final Burst", choose two cards instead of one.
flavor: That's not enough! If you wanna stop me, bring a hundred people!

name: Desire Devil, Fuujo
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into soul by the ability of your vanguard with "Greedon" in its card name, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and you may retire it.[AUTO](Soul):When your vanguard with "Greedon" in its card name attacks, [COST][bind this card], and until end of that battle, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: Tainted neighs that spread impurities.

name: Dragontree Wretch, Skull Chemdah
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker. Search your deck for up to one "Masque of Hydragrum", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A fallen spawn of the Dragontree. It knows no sin, only inexhaustible greed.

name: Twin Marvel Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When you [Soul-Blast 3] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of the deck or into the soul, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Let us find it. That aster you desire.

name: Solide Sturmer
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When the set order you played from hand is put into the order zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. You may look at the top five cards of your deck. If you do, choose up to one set order from among the cards you looked, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A flashy industry reinforces the country's development.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Grenade Marieda
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may choose one of your opponent's card imprisoned in your Prison. If you do, your opponent puts that card on the bottom of their deck, chooses a grade 0 card from their drop, imprisons it in your Prison, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Fall apart and be blown away♡

name: Dissolving Heat Monster, Radiabilio
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, if the sum of the grades of set orders in your order zone is 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000, if it is 5 or greater, it gets [Power] +5000, and if it is 7 or greater, it gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Destruction continues, pursuing further power and evolution.

name: Cardinal Principle, Lorfield
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call a Shadow Army token to a (RC) in the same column as this unit.
flavor: A shadow that will not drown in the night.

name: Dependable Pierce Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Solrairon" in its card name, choose up to one normal unit from your hand, and reveal it. If you revealed a card, draw a card, and put that revealed card on the top of your deck.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When a normal unit is revealed by the ability of your vanguard with "Solrairon" in its card name, this unit gets "[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, you may have this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you do, put this unit into the soul at the end of that battle." until end of turn.
flavor: An accumulation of solid moves. That is the true shortcut to victory.

name: Effulgent Wizard
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck. If your vanguard is [Stand], you may put the card you looked at into the soul.[AUTO](RC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Sis is watching! I can't afford to look uncool!

name: Sacrosanct Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your card's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If this unit was placed from deck, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: Answering the plea, the dragon fires an arrow of light.

name: Replenishment Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard, if you have a grade 3 or greater [Stand] vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to two cards from among them, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor: Supplies delivery~♪ We have all the good stuff~!

name: Dragontree Wretch, Depth Iweleth
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker. Search your deck for up to one "Masque of Hydragrum", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A fallen spawn of the Dragontree. From the watery abyss, foolishness sneers.

name: Keel Severing
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When the "Teasing Spiritualist, Zorga Masques" on your (VC) attacks, if you do not have a "Keel Severing" on your (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire a rear-guard], and call this card to a (RC) with a Dragontree marker.
flavor: A deadly grudge unleashed by naked hostility.

name: Knight of Amity, Roderick
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other grade 1 or less rear-guard is retired by your card's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I won't waste it. Absolutely.

name: Spouting Intimacy, Amlia
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your vanguard is "Servitude of Funeral Procession, Lianorn Masques", this unit gets [Power] +5000, and "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].".
flavor: I believe in the bandmaster!

name: Masque of Hydragrum
effect: Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with "Dragontree" or "Masques" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[ACT]Drop:If you have a grade 3 vanguard without "Masques" in its card name, [COST][reveal a grade 3 card with "Masques" in its card name from hand], and ride the card revealed for this cost as [Stand]. If you rode, put this card into the soul, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, and you did not persona ride this turn, you activate persona ride.
flavor: This is proof and the key to connecting with the great Dragontree.

name: Wilderness Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have three or more Dragontree markers on your (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and retire it.
flavor: Those who adapt to the new land will create a new era.

name: Scarlet Flame Bow General, Ruguent
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Gandeeva" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire a card, draw a card, choose a card from your drop, and bind it face down.
flavor: None of you stand a chance of winning in the mountains where it's our backyard!!

name: Blaze Maiden, Hanife
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be ridden. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your opponent's rear-guard was not retired this turn, retire this unit.
flavor: Let's be wrapped in the embers and dance one song.

name: Scarlet Flame Bow of Demolition
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]! Choose a column, and retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in that column.
flavor: Scarlet flames incinerate the enemy, and the ash remains are returned to the mountain.

name: Cranium Burner
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Drajeweled" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, if you [Soul-Blast 4] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability this turn, [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Burn down. The world should be a simpler place.

name: Awkward Ravager
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be ridden. [CONT](RC):If you did not [Soul-Blast 3] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your card's ability this turn, this unit cannot attack or boost.
flavor: The scatterings of souls. That brilliance alone is the only currency that drives him.

name: Desire Devil, Guutaran
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into soul by the ability of your vanguard with "Greedon" in its card name, choose one of your vanguards, and you may have it get [Power] +15000 until end of turn. If you do, that unit gets drive -1 until end of turn.
flavor: Anyone who disturbs its idle slumber will not be forgiven.

name: Cage of Furious Star
effect: [Soul-Charge 1], choose a grade 3 or less card from your soul, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Come. It's your turn.

name: Thunderous Fist Dragon, Gyeirom Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have three or more Dragontree markers on your (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: It is at the end of religious discipline that a new state can be attained.

name: Blue Deathster, Req Gewehnr
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Avantgarda" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if your Strategy card was put from order zone into soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Resound. Requiem of bullets.

name: Putzen Schwestern, Weepl
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit gets all of the following according to the number of "Dispatch! Three Sisters of Cleaning!" in your order zone.・One or more‐During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.・Two or more‐This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects. (Active on opponent's turn too)・Three or more‐If this unit is in the back row center column, all of your back row units get [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Let's all work hard today too, and do our best to clean up~

name: Dispatch! Three Sisters of Cleaning!
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your order zone)[CONT]Order Zone:During your turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +2000.
flavor: Immediate dispatchment at one phone call!Any kind of dirt will be eliminated!Leave all the cleaning to us, Putzen Schwestern!

name: Academic of Verification, Piric
effect: [AUTO](RC):When a normal unit is revealed by the ability of your vanguard with "Solrairon" in its card name, until end of turn, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000.
flavor: Let's move on to clinical trials.

name: Truncate Breath Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck. If you put it on the bottom of your deck, look at the top card of your deck.
flavor: If unnecessary, simply burn it all with my flames.

name: Magic of Water Droplets, Wtater
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if you have a vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
flavor: Right now, I can still throw it into the waters for you.

name: Trumpet of Blessing
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!Look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or less card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.
flavor: There is hope. No matter when.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lahbart
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have three or more Dragontree markers on your (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: We have to adapt to the changing world.

name: Surging Sharp Fangs
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be ridden. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, retire this unit.
flavor: From the vast black seas, a ferocious assailant emerges.

name: Champion of Loss
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your order card's ability, you may draw two cards. If you drew cards, choose two cards from your hand, and discard them.
flavor: Wealth, ambition, fame. Everything is now in oblivion.

name: Rousing Rasp
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with grade greater than or equal to your vanguard from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and discard the rest.
flavor: The gates to limbo open, and the hands of demons reach out in envy of the living.

name: Thirstray Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: So long as my thirst will be satisfied, I care not what it takes.

name: Equip Scrape Dragon, Drilyze
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a unit in the XoverDress state, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: What lies ahead the harrowing will be a fun world.

name: Scarlet Flame Bow General, Stirgna
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Gandeeva" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & bind one other rear-guard face down], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire a card, draw a card, choose a card from your drop, and bind it face down.
flavor: I'll die with this view seared in my eyes. Luxurious, isn't it?

name: Scarlet Flame Bow General, Dipaanel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Gandeeva" in its card name, choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, the cost of that unit's original [ACT] ability is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1].
flavor: Scarlet Flame soldiers speak of themselves not with words but through their battle results.

name: Strenuous Bomber Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose one of your vanguards, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for every two grades of that unit.
flavor: Fire the explosive flames that will burn through you.

name: Scarlet Flame Bow Soldier, Aguired
effect: [CONT](VC):If your opponent has one or less rear-guards, when you would ride "Scarlet Flame Bow General, Dipaanel" from your ride deck, you can ride without discarding a card from hand.[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if your opponent has two or more rear-guards, you may call this card to (RC).
flavor: Those who trample the boundary will be subjected to the dragon's judgement.

name: Scarlet Flame Bow Soldier, Boucen
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When your vanguard with "Gandeeva" in its card name attacks, if your bind zone has three or more cards, [COST][bind this unit face down], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: A double shot wouldn't be a single arrow.

name: Scarlet Flame New Soldier, Buckish
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: I'll survive for sure, and become an outstanding warrior!

name: Generous Evil Swordsman, Zaleos
effect: [CONT](RC):If this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, this unit gets "[AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle", and [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: We'll accept a～nything. That's who we are, isn't it?

name: Steam Performer, Ddu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your vanguards, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn for every two grades of that unit.
flavor: "History's Greatest" has an amazing ring to it, doesn't it?

name: Steam Hunter, Zuqaqip
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your vanguard is "Xeno Almajestar, Astroea=Bico Masques", this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Enchanted by the stars, more than the fleeting flow of time.

name: Brawl Field Hydra
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have three or more Dragontree markers on your (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 3 or less card from your soul, and call it to (RC).
flavor: Would you like to be eaten by "me" or "myself"?

name: Gifforz Cetos
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Almajestar" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], choose up to two [Critical] triggers from your bind zone, and put them into your soul.
flavor: Engrave that star once again.

name: Steam Launcher, Yasmah
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your "Karmic Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled Masques" is placed on (VC), [COST][put this unit into soul], and draw a card.
flavor: This is the shape of the future I believe in!

name: Spooky Chirpy
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The miasma swirling in the earth began to corrupt the skies as well.

name: Diabolos Girls, Heidi
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Let's do it! Go! Go! Diabolos!!

name: Volheimer Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for each of your Dragontree markers on your (RC).
flavor: There is no light more alluring than devastating power.

name: Cardinal Noid, Grunder
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, you may look at the top seven cards of your deck. If you do, choose up to two World cards from among the cards you looked, discard them, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][retire this unit], choose a World card from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: Light is torn asunder, and true night comes to be.

name: Threat Fusionegater
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your order zone has a grade 3 or greater set order, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: A deformed shape floats in the sky. Is it... heaven's helping hand?

name: Flight Robo, Erial Haeli
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is placed by your Prison's ability, you may return this unit to your hand.
flavor: Suspect on the run confirmed. Shifting to pursuit from air!

name: SeRVe ９-G
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your order zone has a grade 3 or greater set order, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Busy, busy.

name: Putzen Schwestern, Bruush
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one "Dispatch! Three Sisters of Cleaning!" or "Putzen Schwestern, Weepl" from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Our work is perfect as ever, if I may say so myself.

name: Putzen Schwestern, Mopy
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one "Dispatch! Three Sisters of Cleaning!" or "Putzen Schwestern, Bruush" from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Squeaky clean～♪ All pristine～♪

name: Inciting Monster, Trafficon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose one of your vanguards, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for every two grades of that unit.
flavor: Alーright, please proceed with caution.

name: Eulogistic Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your vanguard's grade is greater than your opponent's vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Give praise! Brought forth from the skies, the arrival of a new era!

name: Sage of Robust, Stogron
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Solrairon" in its card name, choose a "Sage of Elixir, Eliron" from your soul, and call that card and this card to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When a normal unit is revealed by the ability of your vanguard with "Solrairon" in its card name, this unit gets "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1]." until end of turn.
flavor: Indubitable wisdom becomes power that will yield to nothing.

name: Incisive Crow
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose one of your vanguards, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for every two grades of that unit.
flavor: What he obeys is a greater authority.

name: Intriguing Academic, Intieres
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from deck, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Knowledge is infinite. Thus the boy devotes himself to studying day and night.

name: Orderly Academic, Ordelio
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other grade 1 or less unit is placed on (RC) from deck, you may put that unit into the soul. If you put it into the soul, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: That needs to be cleared away as well? It will be done.

name: Balmy Violinist
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When your other unit [Stand] by your card's ability, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of the units [Stand], and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The melody echoes with the refreshing wind, and always puts my heart at ease.

name: Sage of Elixir, Eliron
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Sage of Robust, Stogron", you declare either normal unit or trigger unit, and reveal the top card of your deck. If you revealed the card type you declared, you may put it into your hand. If you did not put a card into your hand, put that revealed card into the soul or on the top of the deck. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Solrairon" in its card name, choose up to one normal unit from your hand, and reveal it. If you revealed a card, draw a card, and put that revealed card on the top of the deck.
flavor: The cure-all Elixir is handed over with poisoned words.

name: Sage of Horoscopy, Sron
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: You ought to be able to see it; the light that does not disappear even in the dark.

name: Ascertain Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000.
flavor: The draining of the earth, and the unusual weather... I must go investigate them as well.

name: Screwbullet Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if it is the fourth battle of this turn or more, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Now is the time――! Attack!!

name: Sea Demon of Satiation
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you play a grade 3 or greater normal order, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Its pastime is the wreaking and devouring of vessels.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Kornms
effect: [CONT](RC):If this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, this unit gets "[AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.", and [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: What was sought was the power to adapt to new environments.

name: Spry Cactus
effect: [CONT](RC):If this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, this unit gets "Boost", and can intercept from the back row. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: One-two! I don't know what's up, but I'm all pumped up!

name: Compass Needle Spinning
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you play an order with Alchemagic, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit.
flavor: An eternal voyage with no destination.

name: Citrusan
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 0 rear-guard, [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your grade 0 rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: You there! If you're exhausted, eat this!

name: Deathly Silence Huntsman, Lepardia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, choose one of your front row rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Power is but only power and nothing more. How its used is what matters.

name: Where Sakura Dance, Sakura Miko
effect: [CONT]:This card is also regarded as "First to Head Towards a Dream! Michu".[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If you have an "All Set Up!" in your order zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC) or discard it.Cannonball-[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. [Glitter] (This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Taking on each day with aspiration in my heart!

name: Elite Miko VTuber, Sakura Miko
effect: [CONT]:This card is also regarded as "Sparkling Summer! Michu".[AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a grade 1 card with "Michu" in its card name, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Noqno" in its card name or one Cannonball card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter] (This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Nya-hello~! It's Sakura Miko~!

name: Idol VTuber, Hoshimachi Suisei
effect: [CONT]:This card is also regarded as "Happy Shopping! Michu".[AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a grade 0 card with "Michu" in its card name, search your deck for up to one "All Set Up!", put it into the order zone, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter] (This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: It's your shooting star, your diamond in the rough! Idol VTuber Hoshimachi Suisei!

name: To Her Dream Stage, Hoshimachi Suisei
effect: [CONT]:This card is also regarded as "Shy Vocal, Noqno".[AUTO]Drop:When a card is put into your order zone, if you do not have a unit with "Noqno" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to your back row center (RC). (You can only call one of this card if there are two in your drop)[Glitter]-Michu (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Michu" in its card name)[AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], [Stand] this unit, and swap the position of your vanguard with this unit. At the end of that turn, swap the position of that swapped unit with this unit. (The soul does not move)
flavor: To the most spectacular stage I've ever dreamed of!

name: Under a Starry Sky of Dancing Sakura, miComet
effect: [CONT]:This card is also regarded as "Afternoon Dance Lesson, Michu".[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Under a Sakura tree on a starry night.

name: Under a Starry Sky of Dancing Sakura, miComet
effect: [CONT]:This card is also regarded as "Afternoon Dance Lesson, Michu".[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

If your bind zone has five or more face down cards, this unit gets [Critical] +1.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and choose five of your opponent's rear-guards with different grades from each other. Reveal the top five cards of your deck, retire all of the chosen units with the same grades as the cards revealed, shuffle your deck, and if you retired one or less cards, draw a card, choose a card from your drop, and bind it face down.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if you have a vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.

name: Trumpet of Blessing
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!Look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or less card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Keel Severing
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When the "Teasing Spiritualist, Zorga Masques" on your (VC) attacks, if you do not have a "Keel Severing" on your (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire a rear-guard], and call this card to a (RC) with a Dragontree marker.

name: Dragontree Wretch, Depth Iweleth
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker. Search your deck for up to one "Masque of Hydragrum", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Knight of Amity, Roderick
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other grade 1 or less rear-guard is retired by your card's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Spouting Intimacy, Amlia
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your vanguard is "Servitude of Funeral Procession, Lianorn Masques", this unit gets [Power] +5000, and "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].".

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lahbart
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have three or more Dragontree markers on your (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Surging Sharp Fangs
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be ridden. [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, retire this unit.

name: Champion of Loss
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your order card's ability, you may draw two cards. If you drew cards, choose two cards from your hand, and discard them.

name: Rousing Rasp
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with grade greater than or equal to your vanguard from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and discard the rest.

name: Masque of Hydragrum
effect: Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with "Dragontree" or "Masques" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[ACT]Drop:If you have a grade 3 vanguard without "Masques" in its card name, [COST][reveal a grade 3 card with "Masques" in its card name from hand], and ride the card revealed for this cost as [Stand]. If you rode, put this card into the soul, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, and you did not persona ride this turn, you activate persona ride.

name: Mirror Reflection Equip, Mirrors Vairina
effect: XoverDress - One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by XoverDress, choose up to two cards with "Vairina" in their card names from your drop, and put them as this unit's originalDress.[AUTO](RC):When this unit in the XoverDress state attacks, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. Then, [COST][put an originalDress of this unit with "Vairina" in its card name into drop], and perform "draw a card" or "[Counter-Charge 1]".

name: Karmic Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 with "Drajeweled" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Drajeweled" in its different card name from this unit from your hand, soul, or drop], choose two cards from your drop, put them into your soul, and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 4] cards with different grades], choose two of your opponent's rear-guards, retire them, choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and until end of turn, increase or decrease its [Power] to 1.

name: Xeno Almajestar, Astroea=Bico Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 with "Astroea" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Astroea" in its different card name from this unit from your hand, soul, or drop], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 3], bind all [Critical] trigger [Soul-Blast] for this cost, choose one of your rear-guards, [Stand] it, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn for every two [Critical] triggers in your bind zone.

name: Teasing Spiritualist, Zorga Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 with "Zorga" in its card name.[CONT](VC):When you would play a normal order, you can bind a normal order from your drop, and Alchemagic.[CONT](VC):If you did Alchemagic this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Zorga" in its different card name from this unit from your hand, soul, or drop], choose a card from your drop, and call it to (RC) if it is a unit card, or put it into your hand if it is a normal order.

name: Servitude of Funeral Procession, Lianorn Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 with "Lianorn" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Lianorn" in its different card name from this unit from your hand, soul, or drop], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, call it to (RC), choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, choose up to three of your back row [Stand] units with "Boost", and boost this unit. If you boosted with three or more units, at the end of that battle, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose two of your rear-guards, and [Stand] them.

name: Dragontree
effect: (This represents a Dragontree marker, and cannot be put in a deck)During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Dragontree" or "Masques" in its card name, all of the units on this circle get [Power] +5000.
